review: I really appreciate the versatility of this tool and enjoy all the "little extras" that you can get with Amazon coins.  The fireplace and aquarium are favorites.  I have a prime membership; I don't even watch live TV anymore.  I rely completely on the Fire stick and am never disappointed.  I also subscribe to several series shows and get the commercial free versions the morning after they are aired on TV.  We could get rid of cable entirely if my husband could get sports games live on the stick.

review: We love our Amazon Fire TV Stick!  We're hooked on Netflix and Amazon Prime tv/movies and the Fire Stick makes everything easy to access from any tv in the house.
